actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE report_data.edu_object_state_appendix_1
SET 
    total_sanitary_units = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.total_sanitary_units}},
		compliance_status = {{ table_appendix_1.updatedRow.compliance_status ? table_appendix_1.updatedRow.compliance_status : null }},
		non_compliance_details = '{{ table_appendix_1.updatedRow.non_compliance_details ? table_appendix_1.updatedRow.non_compliance_details : '' }}',
		inspection_orders = {{ table_appendix_1.updatedRow.inspection_orders ? table_appendix_1.updatedRow.inspection_orders : null }},
		units_needing_repair = {{ table_appendix_1.updatedRow.units_needing_repair }},
    work_description = '{{ table_appendix_1.updatedRow.work_description ? table_appendix_1.updatedRow.work_description : '' }}',
    object_address_id = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.object_address_id}},
		planned_year_of_implementation = {{ table_appendix_1.updatedRow.planned_year_of_implementation ? table_appendix_1.updatedRow.planned_year_of_implementation : null }},
    allocated_funds_current_repair_2025 = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.allocated_funds_current_repair_2025}},
    allocated_funds_current_repair_2026 = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.allocated_funds_current_repair_2026}},
    allocated_funds_current_repair_2027 = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.allocated_funds_current_repair_2027}},
    allocated_funds_capital_repair_2025 = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.allocated_funds_capital_repair_2025}},
    allocated_funds_capital_repair_2026 = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.allocated_funds_capital_repair_2026}},
    allocated_funds_capital_repair_2027 = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.allocated_funds_capital_repair_2027}},
    additional_funds_current_repair_2025 = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.additional_funds_current_repair_2025}},
    additional_funds_current_repair_2026 = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.additional_funds_current_repair_2026}},
    additional_funds_current_repair_2027 = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.additional_funds_current_repair_2027}},
    additional_funds_capital_repair_2025 = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.additional_funds_capital_repair_2025}},
    additional_funds_capital_repair_2026 = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.additional_funds_capital_repair_2026}},
    additional_funds_capital_repair_2027 = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.additional_funds_capital_repair_2027}}
WHERE 
    directory_inn_id = {{appsmith.store.user.ou_id}}
    AND row_index = {{table_appendix_1.updatedRow.row_index}};
